tags.name: Regular Payments API
tags.description:
Obtain the Regular Payment details authorised to be shared by the customer. Regular Payments API is a consumer API. To access data you'll need the customer's consent.

Host URL

CommBank requests are passed to the URL https://secure.api.commbank.com.au/api/cds-au/v1/banking

CBA – CommBiz requests are passed to the URL https://secure.cdr.commbiz.api.commbank.com.au/cbzapi/cds-au/v1/banking

get.description: Obtain direct debit authorisations for multiple, filtered accounts.

parameters.name: product-category
parameters.description: Used to filter results on the productCategory field applicable to accounts. If absent then all accounts returned.

parameters.name: open-status
parameters.description: Used to filter results according to open/closed status. If absent then ALL is assumed.

parameters.name: is-owned
parameters.description: Filters accounts based on whether they are owned by the authorised customer.  True for owned accounts, false for unowned accounts and absent for all accounts.

x-fapi-interaction-id.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

scheduledPayments.description: The list of scheduled payments to return.

accountId.description: A unique ID of the account adhering to the standards for ID permanence.

lastDebitDateTime.description: The date and time of the last debit executed under this authorisation.

lastDebitAmount.description: The amount of the last debit executed under this authorisation.

description.description: Description of the authorised entity derived from previously executed direct debits

financialInstitution.description: Name of the financial institution through which the direct debit will be executed. Is required unless the payment is made via a credit card scheme.

abn.description: Australian Business Number for the authorised entity.

acn.description: Australian Company Number for the authorised entity.

arbn.description: Australian Registered Body Number for the authorised entity.

scheduledPaymentId.description: A unique ID of the scheduled payment adhering to the standards for ID permanence.

nickname.description: The short display name of the payee as provided by the customer.

payerReference.description: The reference for the transaction, empty string if no data provided.

payeeReference.description: The reference for the transaction, empty string if no data provided.

nextPaymentDate.description: The date of the next payment under the recurrence schedule.

recurrenceUType.description: The type of recurrence used to define the schedule.

BankingScheduledPaymentRecurrence.description: Object containing the detail of the schedule for the payment

paymentDate.description: The scheduled date for the once off payment.

BankingScheduledPaymentRecurrenceOnceOff.description: Indicates that the payment is a once off payment on a specific future date.

finalPaymentDate.description: The limit date after which no more payments should be made using this schedule.

paymentsRemaining.description: Indicates the number of payments remaining in the schedule.

nonBusinessDayTreatment.description: Enumerated field giving the treatment where a scheduled payment date is not a business day.

intervals.description: An array of interval objects defining the payment schedule.

BankingScheduledPaymentRecurrenceInterva.description: Indicates that the schedule of payments is defined by a series of intervals.

dayInInterval.description: Uses an interval to define the ordinal day within the interval defined by the interval field on which the payment occurs.

finalPaymentDate.description: The limit date after which no more payments should be made using this schedule.

paymentsRemaining.description: Indicates the number of payments remaining in the schedule.

lastWeekDay.description: The weekDay specified. The payment will occur on the last occurrence of this weekday in the interval.

nonBusinessDayTreatment.description: Enumerated field giving the treatment where a scheduled payment date is not a business day.

BankingScheduledPaymentRecurrenceLastWee.description: Indicates that the schedule of payments is defined according to the last occurrence of a specific weekday in an interval.

description.description: Description of the event and conditions that will result in the payment.

BankingScheduledPaymentRecurrenceEventBa.description: Indicates that the schedule of payments is defined according to an external event that cannot be predetermined.

accountId.description: ID of the account that is the source of funds for the payment.

BankingScheduledPaymentFrom.description: Object containing details of the source of the payment.

isAmountCalculated.description: Flag indicating whether the amount of the payment is calculated based on the context of the event.

amount.description: The amount of the next payment if known.

currency.description: The currency for the payment. AUD assumed if not present.

BankingScheduledPaymentSet.description: The set of payment amounts and destination accounts for this payment accommodating multi-part payments.

toUType.description: The type of object provided that specifies the destination of the funds for the payment.

accountId.description: Present if toUType is set to accountId.

payeeId.description: Present if toUType is set to payeeId. Indicates that the payment is to registered payee that can be accessed using the payee end point.

BankingScheduledPaymentTo.description: Object containing details of the destination of the payment.

accountName.description: Name of the account to pay to.

bsb.description: BSB of the account to pay to.

accountNumber.description: Number of the account to pay to.

cardNumber.description: Name of the account to pay to.

name.description: The name assigned to the PayID by the owner of the PayID.

identifier.description: The identifier of the PayID (dependent on type).

billerCode.description: BPAY Biller Code of the Biller.

fedWireNumber.description: Number for Fedwire payment (Federal Reserve Wire Network).

sortCode.description: Sort code used for account identification in some jurisdictions.

chipNumber.description: Number for the Clearing House Interbank Payments System.

legalEntityIdentifier.description: The legal entity identifier (LEI) for the beneficiary.

items.description: Array of specific accountIds to obtain authorisations for.

self.description: Fully qualified link that generated the current response document.
Fully qualified link that generated the current response document2.

first.description: URI to the first page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page.

prev.description: URI to the previous page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page.

next.description: URI to the next page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page.

last.description: URI to the last page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page.

totalRecords.description: The total number of records in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

code.description: Must be one of the following: 0001 – Account not able to be found.

title.description: Must be one of the following: Invalid account.

detail.description: ID of the account not found.

meta.description: Optional additional data for specific error types.

errors.title: page is invalid
errors.detail: page must be a valid number.

errors.title: x-v is invalid
errors.detail: x-v header must be a supported version number.

errors.Title: page-size is Invalid
errors.Detail: page-size must be a number and between 1 and 1000.

errors.title: Server Error
errors.detail: An error has occurred whilst processing your request. Please try again later.

ParamXFapiInterationId.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
ParamXFapiInterationId.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

ParamXFapiAuthDate.name: x-fapi-auth-date
ParamXFapiAuthDate.description: The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXCdsClientHeaders.name: x-cds-client-headers
ParamXCdsClientHeaders.description: The customer's original standard http headers encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamPageSize.name: page-size
ParamPageSize.description: Number of records to return with the page

ParamAcceptHeader.name: Accept
ParamAcceptHeader.description: Content-Type that is acceptable for the server's response.

ParamXVHeader.name: x-v
ParamXVHeader.description: Version of the API end point being requested.

ParamXMinVHeader.name: x-min-v
ParamXMinVHeader.description: Minimum version of the API end point you are requesting.

ParamProductCategory.name: product-category
ParamProductCategory.description: Used to filter results on the productCategory field applicable to accounts. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied. If absent then all accounts returned.
